name: Vacation Village Resort
description: Glamorous 2-bedroom condo with 7 hot tubs and 7 large pools. Located in the heart of Orlando.

name: Wyndham Bonnet Creek Resort
description: Stay on Disney property with lazy rivers. Stylish condos that feel like heaven on earth.

name: Orlando Sunshine Resort
description: Luxurious condo 7 minutes from Universal. Features water park, lake views, and more. Known for being heaven on earth.

name: Wyndham Ocean Walk
description: Oceanfront condos with full kitchen. Best location, 1 minute walking from all attractions.

name: Wyndham New Orleans French
description: Cozy retreat for history explorers. Located on Bourbon St., offering a prime location.
